title: Life Purpose & Meaning
subtitle: Finding what you're here to do
description: Move beyond aimlessness into clarity. This course guides you through discovering your values, gifts, and calling—not as a single perfect answer, but as an ongoing relationship with meaning.

modules.title: Why Purpose Matters
modules.description: The cost of aimlessness and the value of direction

modules.title: Clarifying Your Values
modules.description: What actually matters to you—not what should

modules.title: Discovering Your Gifts
modules.description: What you're naturally built to offer

modules.title: Wounds as Wisdom
modules.description: How your struggles become your gift

modules.title: Finding Your Calling
modules.description: Where values, gifts, and world need intersect

modules.title: Living Purposefully
modules.description: Making purpose real in daily life

whatYouLearn: Understand why purpose is essential for wellbeing
Clarify your actual values (not inherited ones)
Identify your natural gifts and strengths
Transform painful experiences into purposeful direction
Find where your gifts meet the world's need
requirements: Some life experience to draw from
Willingness to question assumptions about success
Shadow Work Foundations helpful for wounds module

questions.question: Why is purpose important for human wellbeing?
options: It makes you rich
Meaning and direction reduce depression, increase resilience, and motivate action
It isn't - purpose is a luxury
Only religious people need purpose

questions.question: What's the difference between values and goals?
options: They're the same thing
Values are how you want to be; goals are what you want to achieve
Goals are more important
Values don't matter in modern life

questions.question: How do you identify your natural gifts?
options: Take an online quiz
Notice what comes easily, what you're drawn to, and what others seek from you
Your parents tell you
You either have gifts or you don't

questions.question: How can wounds become wisdom?
options: They can't - wounds are just damage
Working through struggles gives you understanding and gifts to help others with similar challenges
You have to forget your wounds
Only if you become a therapist

questions.question: What is a 'calling' in this context?
options: A literal voice telling you what to do
The intersection of your values, gifts, and what the world needs
Your job title
What your parents wanted for you

questions.question: How do you live purpose in daily life?
options: Quit your job and become a monk
Align small daily choices with your values and express your gifts wherever you are
Wait until conditions are perfect
Purpose is separate from daily life

questions.question: Is purpose something you find once or an ongoing process?
options: You find it once and you're done
Purpose evolves - it's an ongoing relationship with meaning
If you haven't found it by 30, you never will
Purpose doesn't exist
